title: Becca & Tayshia Break Down Night One with Comedian Heather McDonald
description:
“The Bachelorette” is back! Tayshia joins Becca as co-host and gives exclusive, behind-the-scenes details from the first night of Katie’s season. Tayshia shares what stood out to her and what it was like standing by Katie’s side throughout her journey. 

Plus, comedian Heather McDonald offers her hilarious take on the episode, and she and Becca share their predictions on who will make it to Katie’s final four. 

Don’t forget to rate and subscribe so you never miss an episode. 

Thanks to our sponsors: 

Peloton: OnePeloton.com 

Rothy’s: Rothys.com/bhh 

Noom: Noom.com/bhh
